proposals.title: Lower Transaction Fees
proposals.description: Reduce fees from 0.3% to 0.25% to increase volume
proposals.summary: This proposal aims to reduce trading fees from 0.3% to 0.25% to boost trading volume.
proposals.impact: Lower revenue per trade but potentially higher volume.

proposals.title: Add NFT Support
proposals.description: Enable NFT minting and trading on the platform
proposals.summary: Add support for NFT minting, trading, and marketplace features.
proposals.impact: Opens new revenue streams and attracts NFT creators to the platform.

proposals.title: Increase Staking Rewards
proposals.description: Boost staking APY from 12% to 15% for long-term holders
proposals.summary: Increase staking rewards to incentivize long-term holding.
proposals.impact: Higher inflation but stronger holder incentives.

proposals.title: Treasury Diversification
proposals.description: Allocate 20% of treasury to stablecoins for stability
proposals.summary: Diversify treasury holdings to reduce risk.
proposals.impact: More stable treasury value during market volatility.

proposals.title: Launch Grants Program
proposals.summary: Establish a grants program to fund ecosystem development.
proposals.impact: Would have allocated significant funds to developer incentives.

proposals.title: Implement Cross-Chain Bridge
proposals.description: Enable seamless asset transfers between chains
proposals.summary: Build a cross-chain bridge for seamless asset transfers.
proposals.impact: Increases interoperability and liquidity across chains.

proposals.title: DAO Governance Update
proposals.description: Update voting mechanism to quadratic voting
proposals.summary: Implement quadratic voting to prevent whale dominance.
proposals.impact: More democratic voting system but complex implementation.

proposals.title: Emergency Security Patch
proposals.description: Critical security update to fix vulnerability
proposals.summary: Emergency patch for critical security vulnerability.
proposals.impact: Prevents potential exploit and secures user funds.
